channel.title: question on Trisha Gee
channel.description: Recent content in question on Trisha Gee

item.title: Working Environment
item.description: How important to you is your working environment? - Type of desk - What’s on it - Position / type of mouse, keyboard, monitor(s) - Music / background sound (or lack of it) - Open plan vs team room vs cube vs personal office - etc… These physical items could be extended to include your virtual environment: - Eclipse / IntelliJ Idea / Visual Studio (is it still called this?) / other dev enviornment - setup, preferences, window positions - OS - Desktop icons - do you care what / how many / positioning - Which software is always open when you’re working, and does it matter what order you open them in (so they’re in the correct place on your task bar) (additional: does not having enough RAMÂ cripple you because you have to constantly shut and re-open software?
